title: Free Coaching for Bronze/Silver/Gold players
body:
Greetings fellow summoners,

I have some free time and am willing to use that time to give back to the community.
If you are stuck in Bronze / Silver or even Gold I am happy to coach you to figure out why you in that elo and how to improve as a player.
I can discuss micro and macro management if you require it.

Conditions:
1.  Must have discord.
2. Willingness to improve and understand your shortcoming.
3. Pay attention - (This is free and my time is valuable to me).

When you add me, please message me to inform when you are available.
IGN - Sonìc

P.s. If you are curious on my rank and experience:
1. Highest ever rank - Diamond 3
2. Role - Support main.
3. Highest Team Achievement - Top 4 OOL

replies.body: I'm plat and don't need this myself, but the fact you're offering to the community and low elo players who are willing to improve free coaching is awesome. Good on you man. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Just sent you a friend request, i am B3 looking for coaching
